Class FileOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • ome.smuggler.core.io.FileOps

extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for file operations.

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public static void delete(java.nio.file.Path file)
        Deletes the specified file if it exists; does nothing otherwise.
        Parameters:
        file - path to the file to delete.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs; the exception is masked as unchecked.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null.

      • copy

        public static void copy(java.nio.file.Path source,
                        java.nio.file.Path destination)
        Copies the source file to the destination path, overriding it if it exists already. If the source file does not exist, this method does nothing.
        Parameters:
        source - path to the file to copy.
        destination - path to the copied file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs; the exception is masked as unchecked.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any argument is null.

      • transfer

        public static long transfer(java.nio.file.Path from,
                            Nat howManyBytes,
                            java.io.OutputStream to)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Efficiently copies an initial segment of a file into a target stream.
        Parameters:
        from - path to the file from which to get the data.
        howManyBytes - number of bytes to take, starting at the beginning of the file.
        to - where to copy the data.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes actually copied.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • byteLength

        public static Nat byteLength(java.nio.file.Path file)
        Queries the size of the given file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to query.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes in the specified file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs; the exception is masked as unchecked.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null.

      • listChildFiles

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.nio.file.Path> listChildFiles(java.nio.file.Path dir)
        Collects all the regular files directly under the specified directory. Sub-directories are not recursed.
        Parameters:
        dir - the target directory.
        Returns:
        a list of the files found in the directory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs; the exception is masked as unchecked.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null.

      • ensureDirectory

        public static void ensureDirectory(java.nio.file.Path p)
        Calls Files.createDirectories() re-throwing any exception without wrapping.
        Parameters:
        p - the path containing the directories to create.

      • writeNew

        public static void writeNew(java.nio.file.Path file,
                            util.lambda.ConsumerE<java.io.OutputStream> writer)
        Creates a new file and has the given consumer write its contents. If the file already exists, it will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        file - path to the file to create and write.
        writer - writes the file contents.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs; the exception is caught and masked as unchecked.
